title: My Client wont update
body: Step 2/2: Updating League of Legends | 3.50 MB (0 KBps) .. It's stuck at 44% and hasn't moved in about 3 hours.. Plox.. help mi

replies.body: Have you tried disconnecting your internet, and then reconnecting with the patcher stuck like that the entire time? Sometimes just doing that makes it start working again. Might be something to do with a static connection timing out.
